pkgmetadata.longdescription: Description===========This is a Nose Wrapper to make it easy to test Python Packages from within Python.This is done using the module instance or the module name with the following command:.. code:: python import nostril nostril.run('mypackage') # Package name, you must be able to import mypackage nostril.run(mypackage) # Or, if mypackage is already imported...Options=======Alongside with the package name a serie of keyworded arguments can be passed, such as:1. ``cover=True`` in order to include cover coverage to the tests.2. ``html=True`` in order to include coverage and output it to html.3. ``xml=True`` in orer to include coverage and output it to a xml file.4. ``open_html=True`` in order to include html and open the index.html in the end.How to install==============As easy as ``pip install nostril``
